markdownRemark.excerpt: This is a complete study guide created for the final exam in Professor Xue-Wen Chen's Electromagnetics course. The notes offer both a high…
markdownRemark.html:
This is a complete study guide created for the final exam in Professor Xue-Wen Chen's Electromagnetics course. The notes offer both a high-level summary and a look at essential physical models.

Key topics include:

  • Electrostatics
  • Magnetostatics
  • Maxwell's Equations

Download the full notes (PDF)

This is just one part of my HUST course notes collection. If you find this resource helpful, I'd appreciate a star on the GitHub repository!

View on GitHub
